## RenderOptions.enableMainThread property

Render your component in the main thread or not.

It is recommended to use this option only when you need to test the [IFR](https://lynxjs.org/zh/guide/interaction/ifr.html) behavior.

**Signature:**

```typescript
enableMainThread?: boolean;
```
